59 namespace
60 {
61 QString subframe_poses_to_qstring(const moveit::core::FixedTransformsMap& subframes)
62 {
63  QString status_text = "\nIt has the subframes '";
64  for (const auto& subframe : subframes)
65  {
66  status_text += QString::fromStdString(subframe.first) + "', '";
67  }
68  status_text.chop(3);
69  status_text += ".";
70  return status_text;
71 }
72 } // namespace
73 
74 namespace moveit_rviz_plugin
75 {
76 void MotionPlanningFrame::shapesComboBoxChanged(const QString& /*text*/)
77 {
78  switch (ui_->shapes_combo_box->currentData().toInt()) // fetch shape ID from current combobox item
79  {
80  case shapes::BOX:
81  ui_->shape_size_x_spin_box->setEnabled(true);
82  ui_->shape_size_y_spin_box->setEnabled(true);
83  ui_->shape_size_z_spin_box->setEnabled(true);
84  break;
85  case shapes::SPHERE:
86  ui_->shape_size_x_spin_box->setEnabled(true);
87  ui_->shape_size_y_spin_box->setEnabled(false);
88  ui_->shape_size_z_spin_box->setEnabled(false);
89  break;
90  case shapes::CYLINDER:
91  case shapes::CONE:
92  ui_->shape_size_x_spin_box->setEnabled(true);
93  ui_->shape_size_y_spin_box->setEnabled(false);
94  ui_->shape_size_z_spin_box->setEnabled(true);
95  break;
96  case shapes::MESH:
97  ui_->shape_size_x_spin_box->setEnabled(false);
98  ui_->shape_size_y_spin_box->setEnabled(false);
99  ui_->shape_size_z_spin_box->setEnabled(false);
100  break;
101  default:
102  break;
103  }
104 }

106 void MotionPlanningFrame::setLocalSceneEdited(bool dirty)
107 {
108  ui_->publish_current_scene_button->setEnabled(dirty);
109 }
110 
111 bool MotionPlanningFrame::isLocalSceneDirty() const
112 {
113  return ui_->publish_current_scene_button->isEnabled();
114 }
115 
116 void MotionPlanningFrame::publishScene()
117 {
118  const planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO& ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO();
119  if (ps)
120  {
121  moveit_msgs::PlanningScene msg;
122  ps->getPlanningSceneMsg(msg);
123  planning_scene_publisher_.publish(msg);
124  setLocalSceneEdited(false);
125  }
126 }
127 
128 void MotionPlanningFrame::publishSceneIfNeeded()
129 {
130  if (isLocalSceneDirty() &&
131  QMessageBox::question(this, "Update PlanningScene",
132  "You have local changes to your planning scene.\n"
133  "Publish them to the move_group node?",
134  QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, QMessageBox::Yes) == QMessageBox::Yes)
135  publishScene();
136 }
137 
138 void MotionPlanningFrame::clearScene()
139 {
140  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRW();
141  if (ps)
142  {
143  ps->getWorldNonConst()->clearObjects();
144  ps->getCurrentStateNonConst().clearAttachedBodies();
145  moveit_msgs::PlanningScene msg;
146  ps->getPlanningSceneMsg(msg);
147  planning_scene_publisher_.publish(msg);
148  setLocalSceneEdited(false);
149  planning_display_->addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::populateCollisionObjectsList, this));
150  planning_display_->queueRenderSceneGeometry();
151  }
152 }
153 
154 void MotionPlanningFrame::sceneScaleChanged(int value)
155 {
156  const double scaling_factor = (double)value / 100.0; // The GUI slider gives percent values
157  if (scaled_object_)
158  {
159  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRW();
160  if (ps)
161  {
162  if (ps->getWorld()->hasObject(scaled_object_->id_))
163  {
164  ps->getWorldNonConst()->removeObject(scaled_object_->id_);
165  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < scaled_object_->shapes_.size(); ++i)
166  {
167  shapes::Shape* s = scaled_object_->shapes_[i]->clone();
168  s->scale(scaling_factor);
169 
170  Eigen::Isometry3d scaled_shape_pose = scaled_object_->shape_poses_[i];
171  scaled_shape_pose.translation() *= scaling_factor;
172 
173  ps->getWorldNonConst()->addToObject(scaled_object_->id_, scaled_object_->pose_, shapes::ShapeConstPtr(s),
174  scaled_shape_pose);
175  }
176  moveit::core::FixedTransformsMap scaled_subframes = scaled_object_->subframe_poses_;
177  for (auto& subframe_pair : scaled_subframes)
178  subframe_pair.second.translation() *= scaling_factor;
179 
180  ps->getWorldNonConst()->setSubframesOfObject(scaled_object_->id_, scaled_subframes);
181  setLocalSceneEdited();
182  scene_marker_->processMessage(createObjectMarkerMsg(ps->getWorld()->getObject(scaled_object_->id_)));
183  planning_display_->queueRenderSceneGeometry();
184  }
185  else
186  scaled_object_.reset();
187  }
188  else
189  scaled_object_.reset();
190  }
191 }
192 
193 void MotionPlanningFrame::sceneScaleStartChange()
194 {
195  QList<QListWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->collision_objects_list->selectedItems();
196  if (sel.empty())
197  return;
198  if (planning_display_->getPlanningSceneMonitor() && sel[0]->checkState() == Qt::Unchecked)
199  {
200  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRW();
201  if (ps)
202  {
203  scaled_object_ = ps->getWorld()->getObject(sel[0]->text().toStdString());
204  scaled_object_subframes_ = scaled_object_->subframe_poses_;
205  scaled_object_shape_poses_ = scaled_object_->shape_poses_;
206  }
207  }
208 }
209 
210 void MotionPlanningFrame::sceneScaleEndChange()
211 {
212  scaled_object_.reset();
213  ui_->scene_scale->setSliderPosition(100);
214 }
215 
216 void MotionPlanningFrame::removeSceneObject()
217 {
218  QList<QListWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->collision_objects_list->selectedItems();
219  if (sel.empty())
220  return;
221  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRW();
222  if (ps)
223  {
224  for (int i = 0; i < sel.count(); ++i)
225  if (sel[i]->checkState() == Qt::Unchecked)
226  ps->getWorldNonConst()->removeObject(sel[i]->text().toStdString());
227  else
228  ps->getCurrentStateNonConst().clearAttachedBody(sel[i]->text().toStdString());
229  scene_marker_.reset();
230  setLocalSceneEdited();
231  planning_display_->addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::populateCollisionObjectsList, this));
232  planning_display_->queueRenderSceneGeometry();
233  }
234 }
235 
236 static QString decideStatusText(const collision_detection::CollisionEnv::ObjectConstPtr& obj)
237 {
238  QString status_text = "'" + QString::fromStdString(obj->id_) + "' is a collision object with ";
239  if (obj->shapes_.empty())
240  status_text += "no geometry";
241  else
242  {
243  std::vector<QString> shape_names;
244  for (const shapes::ShapeConstPtr& shape : obj->shapes_)
245  shape_names.push_back(QString::fromStdString(shapes::shapeStringName(shape.get())));
246  if (shape_names.size() == 1)
247  status_text += "one " + shape_names[0];
248  else
249  {
250  status_text += QString::fromStdString(boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(shape_names.size())) + " shapes:";
251  for (const QString& shape_name : shape_names)
252  status_text += " " + shape_name;
253  }
254  status_text += ".";
255  }
256  if (!obj->subframe_poses_.empty())
257  {
258  status_text += subframe_poses_to_qstring(obj->subframe_poses_);
259  }
260  return status_text;
261 }
262 
263 static QString decideStatusText(const moveit::core::AttachedBody* attached_body)
264 {
265  QString status_text = "'" + QString::fromStdString(attached_body->getName()) + "' is attached to '" +
266  QString::fromStdString(attached_body->getAttachedLinkName()) + "'.";
267  if (!attached_body->getSubframes().empty())
268  {
269  status_text += subframe_poses_to_qstring(attached_body->getSubframes());
270  }
271  return status_text;
272 }
273 
274 void MotionPlanningFrame::selectedCollisionObjectChanged()
275 {
276  QList<QListWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->collision_objects_list->selectedItems();
277  if (sel.empty())
278  {
279  bool old_state = ui_->object_x->blockSignals(true);
280  ui_->object_x->setValue(0.0);
281  ui_->object_x->blockSignals(old_state);
282 
283  old_state = ui_->object_y->blockSignals(true);
284  ui_->object_y->setValue(0.0);
285  ui_->object_y->blockSignals(old_state);
286 
287  old_state = ui_->object_z->blockSignals(true);
288  ui_->object_z->setValue(0.0);
289  ui_->object_z->blockSignals(old_state);
290 
291  old_state = ui_->object_rx->blockSignals(true);
292  ui_->object_rx->setValue(0.0);
293  ui_->object_rx->blockSignals(old_state);
294 
295  old_state = ui_->object_ry->blockSignals(true);
296  ui_->object_ry->setValue(0.0);
297  ui_->object_ry->blockSignals(old_state);
298 
299  old_state = ui_->object_rz->blockSignals(true);
300  ui_->object_rz->setValue(0.0);
301  ui_->object_rz->blockSignals(old_state);
302 
303  ui_->object_status->setText("");
304  scene_marker_.reset();
305  ui_->pose_scale_group_box->setEnabled(false);
306  }
307  else if (planning_display_->getPlanningSceneMonitor())
308  {
309  // if this is a CollisionWorld element
310  if (sel[0]->checkState() == Qt::Unchecked)
311  {
312  ui_->pose_scale_group_box->setEnabled(true);
313  bool update_scene_marker = false;
314  Eigen::Isometry3d obj_pose;
315  {
316  const planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO& ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO();
317  const collision_detection::CollisionEnv::ObjectConstPtr& obj =
318  ps->getWorld()->getObject(sel[0]->text().toStdString());
319  if (obj)
320  {
321  ui_->object_status->setText(decideStatusText(obj));
322 
323  if (obj->shapes_.size() == 1)
324  {
325  obj_pose = obj->pose_; // valid isometry by contract
326  Eigen::Vector3d xyz = obj_pose.linear().eulerAngles(0, 1, 2);
327  update_scene_marker = true; // do the marker update outside locked scope to avoid deadlock
328 
329  bool old_state = ui_->object_x->blockSignals(true);
330  ui_->object_x->setValue(obj_pose.translation()[0]);
331  ui_->object_x->blockSignals(old_state);
332 
333  old_state = ui_->object_y->blockSignals(true);
334  ui_->object_y->setValue(obj_pose.translation()[1]);
335  ui_->object_y->blockSignals(old_state);
336 
337  old_state = ui_->object_z->blockSignals(true);
338  ui_->object_z->setValue(obj_pose.translation()[2]);
339  ui_->object_z->blockSignals(old_state);
340 
341  old_state = ui_->object_rx->blockSignals(true);
342  ui_->object_rx->setValue(xyz[0]);
343  ui_->object_rx->blockSignals(old_state);
344 
345  old_state = ui_->object_ry->blockSignals(true);
346  ui_->object_ry->setValue(xyz[1]);
347  ui_->object_ry->blockSignals(old_state);
348 
349  old_state = ui_->object_rz->blockSignals(true);
350  ui_->object_rz->setValue(xyz[2]);
351  ui_->object_rz->blockSignals(old_state);
352  }
353  }
354  else
355  ui_->object_status->setText("ERROR: '" + sel[0]->text() + "' should be a collision object but it is not");
356  }
357  if (update_scene_marker && ui_->tabWidget->tabText(ui_->tabWidget->currentIndex()).toStdString() == TAB_OBJECTS)
358  {
359  createSceneInteractiveMarker();
360  }
361  }
362  else
363  {
364  ui_->pose_scale_group_box->setEnabled(false);
365  // if it is an attached object
366  scene_marker_.reset();
367  const planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO& ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO();
368  const moveit::core::AttachedBody* attached_body =
369  ps->getCurrentState().getAttachedBody(sel[0]->text().toStdString());
370  if (attached_body)
371  ui_->object_status->setText(decideStatusText(attached_body));
372  else
373  ui_->object_status->setText("ERROR: '" + sel[0]->text() + "' should be an attached object but it is not");
374  }
375  }
376 }
377 
378 void MotionPlanningFrame::objectPoseValueChanged(double /* value */)
379 {
380  updateCollisionObjectPose(true);
381 }
382 
383 void MotionPlanningFrame::updateCollisionObjectPose(bool update_marker_position)
384 {
385  QList<QListWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->collision_objects_list->selectedItems();
386  if (sel.empty())
387  return;
388  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRW();
389  if (ps)
390  {
391  collision_detection::CollisionEnv::ObjectConstPtr obj = ps->getWorld()->getObject(sel[0]->text().toStdString());
392  if (obj)
393  {
394  Eigen::Isometry3d p;
395  p.translation()[0] = ui_->object_x->value();
396  p.translation()[1] = ui_->object_y->value();
397  p.translation()[2] = ui_->object_z->value();
398 
399  p = Eigen::Translation3d(p.translation()) *
400  (Eigen::AngleAxisd(ui_->object_rx->value(), Eigen::Vector3d::UnitX()) *
401  Eigen::AngleAxisd(ui_->object_ry->value(), Eigen::Vector3d::UnitY()) *
402  Eigen::AngleAxisd(ui_->object_rz->value(), Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ()));
403 
404  ps->getWorldNonConst()->setObjectPose(obj->id_, p);
405  planning_display_->queueRenderSceneGeometry();
406  setLocalSceneEdited();
407 
408  // Update the interactive marker pose to match the manually introduced one
409  if (update_marker_position && scene_marker_)
410  {
411  // p is isometry by construction
412  Eigen::Quaterniond eq(p.linear());
413  scene_marker_->setPose(Ogre::Vector3(ui_->object_x->value(), ui_->object_y->value(), ui_->object_z->value()),
414  Ogre::Quaternion(eq.w(), eq.x(), eq.y(), eq.z()), "");
415  }
416  }
417  }
418 }
419 
420 void MotionPlanningFrame::collisionObjectChanged(QListWidgetItem* item)
421 {
422  if (item->type() < (int)known_collision_objects_.size() && planning_display_->getPlanningSceneMonitor())
423  {
424  // if we have a name change
425  if (known_collision_objects_[item->type()].first != item->text().toStdString())
426  renameCollisionObject(item);
427  else
428  {
429  bool checked = item->checkState() == Qt::Checked;
430  if (known_collision_objects_[item->type()].second != checked)
431  attachDetachCollisionObject(item);
432  }
433  }
434 }
435 
436 /* Receives feedback from the interactive marker and updates the shape pose in the world accordingly */
437 void MotionPlanningFrame::imProcessFeedback(visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedback& feedback)
438 {
439  bool old_state = ui_->object_x->blockSignals(true);
440  ui_->object_x->setValue(feedback.pose.position.x);
441  ui_->object_x->blockSignals(old_state);
442 
443  old_state = ui_->object_y->blockSignals(true);
444  ui_->object_y->setValue(feedback.pose.position.y);
445  ui_->object_y->blockSignals(old_state);
446 
447  old_state = ui_->object_z->blockSignals(true);
448  ui_->object_z->setValue(feedback.pose.position.z);
449  ui_->object_z->blockSignals(old_state);
450 
451  Eigen::Quaterniond q;
452  tf2::fromMsg(feedback.pose.orientation, q);
453  Eigen::Vector3d xyz = q.matrix().eulerAngles(0, 1, 2);
454 
455  old_state = ui_->object_rx->blockSignals(true);
456  ui_->object_rx->setValue(xyz[0]);
457  ui_->object_rx->blockSignals(old_state);
458 
459  old_state = ui_->object_ry->blockSignals(true);
460  ui_->object_ry->setValue(xyz[1]);
461  ui_->object_ry->blockSignals(old_state);
462 
463  old_state = ui_->object_rz->blockSignals(true);
464  ui_->object_rz->setValue(xyz[2]);
465  ui_->object_rz->blockSignals(old_state);
466 
467  updateCollisionObjectPose(false);
468 }
469 
470 void MotionPlanningFrame::copySelectedCollisionObject()
471 {
472  QList<QListWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->collision_objects_list->selectedItems();
473  if (sel.empty())
474  return;
475 
476  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRW();
477  if (!ps)
478  return;
479 
480  for (const QListWidgetItem* item : sel)
481  {
482  std::string name = item->text().toStdString();
483  collision_detection::CollisionEnv::ObjectConstPtr obj = ps->getWorld()->getObject(name);
484  if (!obj)
485  continue;
486 
487  // find a name for the copy
488  name.insert(0, "Copy of ");
489  if (ps->getWorld()->hasObject(name))
490  {
491  name += " ";
492  unsigned int n = 1;
493  while (ps->getWorld()->hasObject(name + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(n)))
494  n++;
495  name += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(n);
496  }
497  ps->getWorldNonConst()->addToObject(name, obj->shapes_, obj->shape_poses_);
498  ROS_DEBUG("Copied collision object to '%s'", name.c_str());
499  }
500  setLocalSceneEdited();
501  planning_display_->addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::populateCollisionObjectsList, this));
502 }
503 
504 void MotionPlanningFrame::computeSaveSceneButtonClicked()
505 {
506  if (planning_scene_storage_)
507  {
508  moveit_msgs::PlanningScene msg;
509  planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO()->getPlanningSceneMsg(msg);
510  try
511  {
512  planning_scene_storage_->removePlanningScene(msg.name);
513  planning_scene_storage_->addPlanningScene(msg);
514  }
515  catch (std::exception& ex)
516  {
517  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
518  }
519 
520  planning_display_->addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::populatePlanningSceneTreeView, this));
521  }
522 }
523 
524 void MotionPlanningFrame::computeSaveQueryButtonClicked(const std::string& scene, const std::string& query_name)
525 {
526  moveit_msgs::MotionPlanRequest mreq;
527  constructPlanningRequest(mreq);
528  if (planning_scene_storage_)
529  {
530  try
531  {
532  if (!query_name.empty())
533  planning_scene_storage_->removePlanningQuery(scene, query_name);
534  planning_scene_storage_->addPlanningQuery(mreq, scene, query_name);
535  }
536  catch (std::exception& ex)
537  {
538  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
539  }
540 
541  planning_display_->addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::populatePlanningSceneTreeView, this));
542  }
543 }
544 
545 void MotionPlanningFrame::computeDeleteSceneButtonClicked()
546 {
547  if (planning_scene_storage_)
548  {
549  QList<QTreeWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->planning_scene_tree->selectedItems();
550  if (!sel.empty())
551  {
552  QTreeWidgetItem* s = sel.front();
553  if (s->type() == ITEM_TYPE_SCENE)
554  {
555  std::string scene = s->text(0).toStdString();
556  try
557  {
558  planning_scene_storage_->removePlanningScene(scene);
559  }
560  catch (std::exception& ex)
561  {
562  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
563  }
564  }
565  else
566  {
567  // if we selected a query name, then we overwrite that query
568  std::string scene = s->parent()->text(0).toStdString();
569  try
570  {
571  planning_scene_storage_->removePlanningScene(scene);
572  }
573  catch (std::exception& ex)
574  {
575  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
576  }
577  }
578  planning_display_->addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::populatePlanningSceneTreeView, this));
579  }
580  }
581 }
582 
583 void MotionPlanningFrame::computeDeleteQueryButtonClicked()
584 {
585  if (planning_scene_storage_)
586  {
587  QList<QTreeWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->planning_scene_tree->selectedItems();
588  if (!sel.empty())
589  {
590  QTreeWidgetItem* s = sel.front();
591  if (s->type() == ITEM_TYPE_QUERY)
592  {
593  std::string scene = s->parent()->text(0).toStdString();
594  std::string query_name = s->text(0).toStdString();
595  try
596  {
597  planning_scene_storage_->removePlanningQuery(scene, query_name);
598  }
599  catch (std::exception& ex)
600  {
601  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
602  }
603  planning_display_->addMainLoopJob(
604  boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::computeDeleteQueryButtonClickedHelper, this, s));
605  }
606  }
607  }
608 }
609 
610 void MotionPlanningFrame::computeDeleteQueryButtonClickedHelper(QTreeWidgetItem* s)
611 {
612  ui_->planning_scene_tree->setUpdatesEnabled(false);
613  s->parent()->removeChild(s);
614  ui_->planning_scene_tree->setUpdatesEnabled(true);
615 }
616 
617 void MotionPlanningFrame::checkPlanningSceneTreeEnabledButtons()
618 {
619  QList<QTreeWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->planning_scene_tree->selectedItems();
620  if (sel.empty())
621  {
622  ui_->load_scene_button->setEnabled(false);
623  ui_->load_query_button->setEnabled(false);
624  ui_->save_query_button->setEnabled(false);
625  ui_->delete_scene_button->setEnabled(false);
626  }
627  else
628  {
629  ui_->save_query_button->setEnabled(true);
630 
631  QTreeWidgetItem* s = sel.front();
632 
633  // if the item is a PlanningScene
634  if (s->type() == ITEM_TYPE_SCENE)
635  {
636  ui_->load_scene_button->setEnabled(true);
637  ui_->load_query_button->setEnabled(false);
638  ui_->delete_scene_button->setEnabled(true);
639  ui_->delete_query_button->setEnabled(false);
640  ui_->save_query_button->setEnabled(true);
641  }
642  else
643  {
644  // if the item is a query
645  ui_->load_scene_button->setEnabled(false);
646  ui_->load_query_button->setEnabled(true);
647  ui_->delete_scene_button->setEnabled(false);
648  ui_->delete_query_button->setEnabled(true);
649  }
650  }
651 }
652 
653 void MotionPlanningFrame::computeLoadSceneButtonClicked()
654 {
655  if (planning_scene_storage_)
656  {
657  QList<QTreeWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->planning_scene_tree->selectedItems();
658  if (!sel.empty())
659  {
660  QTreeWidgetItem* s = sel.front();
661  if (s->type() == ITEM_TYPE_SCENE)
662  {
663  std::string scene = s->text(0).toStdString();
664  ROS_DEBUG("Attempting to load scene '%s'", scene.c_str());
665  moveit_warehouse::PlanningSceneWithMetadata scene_m;
666  bool got_ps = false;
667  try
668  {
669  got_ps = planning_scene_storage_->getPlanningScene(scene_m, scene);
670  }
671  catch (std::exception& ex)
672  {
673  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
674  }
675 
676  if (got_ps)
677  {
678  ROS_INFO("Loaded scene '%s'", scene.c_str());
679  if (planning_display_->getPlanningSceneMonitor())
680  {
681  if (scene_m->robot_model_name != planning_display_->getRobotModel()->getName())
682  {
683  ROS_INFO("Scene '%s' was saved for robot '%s' but we are using robot '%s'. Using scene geometry only",
684  scene.c_str(), scene_m->robot_model_name.c_str(),
685  planning_display_->getRobotModel()->getName().c_str());
686  planning_scene_world_publisher_.publish(scene_m->world);
687  // publish the parts that are not in the world
688  moveit_msgs::PlanningScene diff;
689  diff.is_diff = true;
690  diff.name = scene_m->name;
691  planning_scene_publisher_.publish(diff);
692  }
693  else
694  planning_scene_publisher_.publish(static_cast<const moveit_msgs::PlanningScene&>(*scene_m));
695  }
696  else
697  planning_scene_publisher_.publish(static_cast<const moveit_msgs::PlanningScene&>(*scene_m));
698  }
699  else
700  ROS_WARN("Failed to load scene '%s'. Has the message format changed since the scene was saved?",
701  scene.c_str());
702  }
703  }
704  }
705 }
706 
707 void MotionPlanningFrame::computeLoadQueryButtonClicked()
708 {
709  if (planning_scene_storage_)
710  {
711  QList<QTreeWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->planning_scene_tree->selectedItems();
712  if (!sel.empty())
713  {
714  QTreeWidgetItem* s = sel.front();
715  if (s->type() == ITEM_TYPE_QUERY)
716  {
717  std::string scene = s->parent()->text(0).toStdString();
718  std::string query_name = s->text(0).toStdString();
719  moveit_warehouse::MotionPlanRequestWithMetadata mp;
720  bool got_q = false;
721  try
722  {
723  got_q = planning_scene_storage_->getPlanningQuery(mp, scene, query_name);
724  }
725  catch (std::exception& ex)
726  {
727  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
728  }
729 
730  if (got_q)
731  {
732  moveit::core::RobotStatePtr start_state(
733  new moveit::core::RobotState(*planning_display_->getQueryStartState()));
734  moveit::core::robotStateMsgToRobotState(planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO()->getTransforms(),
735  mp->start_state, *start_state);
736  planning_display_->setQueryStartState(*start_state);
737 
738  moveit::core::RobotStatePtr goal_state(new moveit::core::RobotState(*planning_display_->getQueryGoalState()));
739  for (const moveit_msgs::Constraints& goal_constraint : mp->goal_constraints)
740  if (!goal_constraint.joint_constraints.empty())
741  {
742  std::map<std::string, double> vals;
743  for (const moveit_msgs::JointConstraint& joint_constraint : goal_constraint.joint_constraints)
744  vals[joint_constraint.joint_name] = joint_constraint.position;
745  goal_state->setVariablePositions(vals);
746  break;
747  }
748  planning_display_->setQueryGoalState(*goal_state);
749  }
750  else
751  ROS_ERROR("Failed to load planning query '%s'. Has the message format changed since the query was saved?",
752  query_name.c_str());
753  }
754  }
755  }
756 }
757 
758 visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarker
759 MotionPlanningFrame::createObjectMarkerMsg(const collision_detection::CollisionEnv::ObjectConstPtr& obj)
760 {
761  Eigen::Vector3d center;
762  double scale;
763  shapes::computeShapeBoundingSphere(obj->shapes_[0].get(), center, scale);
764  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped shape_pose = tf2::toMsg(
765  tf2::Stamped<Eigen::Isometry3d>(obj->pose_, ros::Time(), planning_display_->getRobotModel()->getModelFrame()));
766  // TODO(felixvd): Consider where to place the object marker.
767  // obj->pose*obj->shape_poses_[0] is backwards compatible, sits on the visible part of
768  // the object, and is more difficult to implement now.
769  // obj->pose is easier to implement and makes more sense.
770  scale = (scale + center.cwiseAbs().maxCoeff()) * 2.0 * 1.2; // add padding of 20% size
771 
772  // create an interactive marker msg for the given shape
773  visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarker imarker =
774  robot_interaction::make6DOFMarker("marker_scene_object", shape_pose, scale);
775  imarker.description = obj->id_;
776  interactive_markers::autoComplete(imarker);
777  return imarker;
778 }
779 
780 void MotionPlanningFrame::createSceneInteractiveMarker()
781 {
782  QList<QListWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->collision_objects_list->selectedItems();
783  if (sel.empty())
784  return;
785 
786  const planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO& ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO();
787  if (!ps)
788  return;
789 
790  const collision_detection::CollisionEnv::ObjectConstPtr& obj =
791  ps->getWorld()->getObject(sel[0]->text().toStdString());
792  if (obj && obj->shapes_.size() == 1)
793  {
794  scene_marker_ = std::make_shared<rviz::InteractiveMarker>(planning_display_->getSceneNode(), context_);
795  scene_marker_->processMessage(createObjectMarkerMsg(obj));
796  scene_marker_->setShowAxes(false);
797 
798  // Connect signals
799  connect(scene_marker_.get(), SIGNAL(userFeedback(visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedback&)), this,
800  SLOT(imProcessFeedback(visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedback&)));
801  }
802  else
803  {
804  scene_marker_.reset();
805  }
806 }
807 
808 void MotionPlanningFrame::renameCollisionObject(QListWidgetItem* item)
809 {
810  long unsigned int version = known_collision_objects_version_;
811  if (item->text().isEmpty())
812  {
813  QMessageBox::warning(this, "Invalid object name", "Cannot set an empty object name.");
814  if (version == known_collision_objects_version_)
815  item->setText(QString::fromStdString(known_collision_objects_[item->type()].first));
816  return;
817  }
818 
819  std::string item_text = item->text().toStdString();
820  bool already_exists = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO()->getWorld()->hasObject(item_text);
821  if (!already_exists)
822  already_exists = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO()->getCurrentState().hasAttachedBody(item_text);
823  if (already_exists)
824  {
825  QMessageBox::warning(this, "Duplicate object name",
826  QString("The name '")
827  .append(item->text())
828  .append("' already exists. Not renaming object ")
829  .append((known_collision_objects_[item->type()].first.c_str())));
830  if (version == known_collision_objects_version_)
831  item->setText(QString::fromStdString(known_collision_objects_[item->type()].first));
832  return;
833  }
834 
835  if (item->checkState() == Qt::Unchecked)
836  {
837  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRW();
838  collision_detection::CollisionEnv::ObjectConstPtr obj =
839  ps->getWorld()->getObject(known_collision_objects_[item->type()].first);
840  if (obj)
841  {
842  known_collision_objects_[item->type()].first = item_text;
843  ps->getWorldNonConst()->removeObject(obj->id_);
844  ps->getWorldNonConst()->addToObject(known_collision_objects_[item->type()].first, obj->pose_, obj->shapes_,
845  obj->shape_poses_);
846  ps->getWorldNonConst()->setSubframesOfObject(obj->id_, obj->subframe_poses_);
847  if (scene_marker_)
848  {
849  scene_marker_.reset();
850  planning_display_->addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::createSceneInteractiveMarker, this));
851  }
852  }
853  }
854  else
855  {
856  // rename attached body
857  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRW();
858  moveit::core::RobotState& cs = ps->getCurrentStateNonConst();
859  const moveit::core::AttachedBody* ab = cs.getAttachedBody(known_collision_objects_[item->type()].first);
860  if (ab)
861  {
862  known_collision_objects_[item->type()].first = item_text;
863  moveit::core::AttachedBody* new_ab =
864  new moveit::core::AttachedBody(ab->getAttachedLink(), known_collision_objects_[item->type()].first,
865  ab->getPose(), ab->getShapes(), ab->getShapePoses(), ab->getTouchLinks(),
866  ab->getDetachPosture(), ab->getSubframes());
867  cs.clearAttachedBody(ab->getName());
868  cs.attachBody(new_ab);
869  }
870  }
871  setLocalSceneEdited();
872 }
873 
874 void MotionPlanningFrame::attachDetachCollisionObject(QListWidgetItem* item)
875 {
876  long unsigned int version = known_collision_objects_version_;
877  bool checked = item->checkState() == Qt::Checked;
878  std::pair<std::string, bool> data = known_collision_objects_[item->type()];
879  moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject aco;
880 
881  if (checked) // we need to attach a known collision object
882  {
883  QStringList links;
884  const std::vector<std::string>& links_std = planning_display_->getRobotModel()->getLinkModelNames();
885  for (const std::string& link : links_std)
886  links.append(QString::fromStdString(link));
887  bool ok = false;
888  QString response =
889  QInputDialog::getItem(this, tr("Select Link Name"), tr("Choose the link to attach to:"), links, 0, false, &ok);
890  if (!ok)
891  {
892  if (version == known_collision_objects_version_)
893  item->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
894  return;
895  }
896  aco.link_name = response.toStdString();
897  aco.object.id = data.first;
898  aco.object.operation = moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD;
899  }
900  else // we need to detach an attached object
901  {
902  const planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO& ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO();
903  const moveit::core::AttachedBody* attached_body = ps->getCurrentState().getAttachedBody(data.first);
904  if (attached_body)
905  {
906  aco.link_name = attached_body->getAttachedLinkName();
907  aco.object.id = attached_body->getName();
908  aco.object.operation = moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::REMOVE;
909  }
910  }
911 
912  moveit::core::RobotState rs(planning_display_->getRobotModel());
913  {
914  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRW();
915  // we loop through the list in case updates were received since the start of the function
916  for (std::pair<std::string, bool>& known_collision_object : known_collision_objects_)
917  if (known_collision_object.first == data.first)
918  {
919  known_collision_object.second = checked;
920  break;
921  }
922  ps->processAttachedCollisionObjectMsg(aco);
923  rs = ps->getCurrentState();
924  }
925 
926  selectedCollisionObjectChanged();
927  setLocalSceneEdited();
928  planning_display_->updateQueryStates(rs);
929  planning_display_->queueRenderSceneGeometry();
930 }
931 
932 void MotionPlanningFrame::populateCollisionObjectsList()
933 {
934  ui_->collision_objects_list->setUpdatesEnabled(false);
935  bool old_state = ui_->collision_objects_list->blockSignals(true);
936  bool octomap_in_scene = false;
937 
938  {
939  QList<QListWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->collision_objects_list->selectedItems();
940  std::set<std::string> to_select;
941  for (QListWidgetItem* item : sel)
942  to_select.insert(item->text().toStdString());
943  ui_->collision_objects_list->clear();
944  known_collision_objects_.clear();
945  known_collision_objects_version_++;
946 
947  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO();
948  if (ps)
949  {
950  const std::vector<std::string>& collision_object_names = ps->getWorld()->getObjectIds();
951  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < collision_object_names.size(); ++i)
952  {
953  if (collision_object_names[i] == planning_scene::PlanningScene::OCTOMAP_NS)
954  {
955  octomap_in_scene = true;
956  continue;
957  }
958 
959  QListWidgetItem* item =
960  new QListWidgetItem(QString::fromStdString(collision_object_names[i]), ui_->collision_objects_list, (int)i);
961  item->setFlags(item->flags() | Qt::ItemIsEditable);
962  item->setToolTip(item->text());
963  item->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
964  if (to_select.find(collision_object_names[i]) != to_select.end())
965  item->setSelected(true);
966  ui_->collision_objects_list->addItem(item);
967  known_collision_objects_.push_back(std::make_pair(collision_object_names[i], false));
968  }
969 
970  const moveit::core::RobotState& cs = ps->getCurrentState();
971  std::vector<const moveit::core::AttachedBody*> attached_bodies;
972  cs.getAttachedBodies(attached_bodies);
973  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < attached_bodies.size(); ++i)
974  {
975  QListWidgetItem* item =
976  new QListWidgetItem(QString::fromStdString(attached_bodies[i]->getName()), ui_->collision_objects_list,
977  (int)(i + collision_object_names.size()));
978  item->setFlags(item->flags() | Qt::ItemIsEditable);
979  item->setToolTip(item->text());
980  item->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
981  if (to_select.find(attached_bodies[i]->getName()) != to_select.end())
982  item->setSelected(true);
983  ui_->collision_objects_list->addItem(item);
984  known_collision_objects_.push_back(std::make_pair(attached_bodies[i]->getName(), true));
985  }
986  }
987  }
988 
989  ui_->clear_octomap_button->setEnabled(octomap_in_scene);
990  ui_->collision_objects_list->blockSignals(old_state);
991  ui_->collision_objects_list->setUpdatesEnabled(true);
992  selectedCollisionObjectChanged();
993 }
994 
995 void MotionPlanningFrame::exportGeometryAsTextButtonClicked()
996 {
997  QString path =
998  QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this, tr("Export Scene Geometry"), tr(""), tr("Scene Geometry (*.scene)"));
999  if (!path.isEmpty())
1000  planning_display_->addBackgroundJob(
1001  boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::computeExportGeometryAsText, this, path.toStdString()), "export as text");
1002 }
1003 
1004 void MotionPlanningFrame::computeExportGeometryAsText(const std::string& path)
1005 {
1006  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO();
1007  if (ps)
1008  {
1009  std::string p = (path.length() < 7 || path.substr(path.length() - 6) != ".scene") ? path + ".scene" : path;
1010  std::ofstream fout(p.c_str());
1011  if (fout.good())
1012  {
1013  ps->saveGeometryToStream(fout);
1014  fout.close();
1015  ROS_INFO("Saved current scene geometry to '%s'", p.c_str());
1016  }
1017  else
1018  ROS_WARN("Unable to save current scene geometry to '%s'", p.c_str());
1019  }
1020 }
1021 
1022 void MotionPlanningFrame::computeImportGeometryFromText(const std::string& path)
1023 {
1024  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRW();
1025  if (ps)
1026  {
1027  std::ifstream fin(path.c_str());
1028  if (ps->loadGeometryFromStream(fin))
1029  {
1030  ROS_INFO("Loaded scene geometry from '%s'", path.c_str());
1031  planning_display_->addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::populateCollisionObjectsList, this));
1032  planning_display_->queueRenderSceneGeometry();
1033  setLocalSceneEdited();
1034  }
1035  else
1036  {
1037  QMessageBox::warning(nullptr, "Loading scene geometry",
1038  "Failed to load scene geometry.\n"
1039  "See console output for more details.");
1040  }
1041  }
1042 }
1043 
1044 void MotionPlanningFrame::importGeometryFromTextButtonClicked()
1045 {
1046  QString path =
1047  QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Import Scene Geometry"), tr(""), tr("Scene Geometry (*.scene)"));
1048  if (!path.isEmpty())
1049  planning_display_->addBackgroundJob(
1050  boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::computeImportGeometryFromText, this, path.toStdString()), "import from text");
1051 }
